document.discussion_title: Great Gobbler Golf Tournament is Aug. 24
document.topic_text: Great Gobbler Golf Tournament is Aug. 24 By Daily Globe Today at 9:42 p.m. WORTHINGTON -- The 30th annual Great Gobbler Golf Tournament, hosted by King Turkey Day Inc., is scheduled for Aug. 24 following multiple weather-related postponements. The 18-hole scramble will take place at GreatLIFE Worthington and begin with a 1 p.m. shotgun start. Teams will be comprised of five people, and fee for the tourney includes a golf cart. Prizes will be awarded for low gross (first place) and low net (first and second place). For more information, call the Worthington Area Chamber of Commerce at 372-2919.

Prizes will be awarded for low gross (first place) and low net (first and second place). For more information, call the Worthington Area Chamber of Commerce at 372-2919.
